price: Ta ce: "To wannan ne fa wanda kuka, zarge* ni a cikinsa! Kuma lalle ne, haƙẽƙa na nẽme shi daga kansa, sai ya tsare gida, kuma nĩ inã rantsuwa, idan bai aikata abin da nake umurnin sa ba, haƙẽƙa anã ɗaure shi. Haƙĩƙa, yanã kasan, cewa daga ƙasƙantattu."
arabic: قَالَتۡ فَذَٰلِكُنَّ ٱلَّذِي لُمۡتُنَّنِي فِيهِۖ وَلَقَدۡ رَٰوَدتُّهُۥ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ فَٱسۡتَعۡصَمَۖ وَلَئِن لَّمۡ يَفۡعَلۡ مَآ ءَامُرُهُۥ لَيُسۡجَنَنَّ وَلَيَكُونٗا مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰغِرِينَ
footnotes: * A cikin maganar mãtar Azĩz a tsakãnin mãtã bãbu wata kunya, dõmin tã nũna kãsãwarsu. Kuma akwai tsõratarwa ga Yũsufu idan bai yi mata ɗã'a ba ga bukãtarta gare shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālat fadhālikunna alladhī lum'tunnanī fīhi walaqad rāwadttuhu ʿan nafsihi fa-is'taʿṣama wala-in lam yafʿal mā āmuruhu layus'jananna walayakūnan mina al-ṣāghirīna
